00019 template<typename Pointer>
00020 class TDeleteAdapter
00021 {
00022 public:
00023        typedef Pointer* ElementType;
00024 
00025        static Pointer* GetPtr(const ElementType& element)
00026        {
00027               return element;
00028        }
00029 
00030        static Pointer* PopPtr(const ElementType& element)
00031        {
00032               return GetPtr(element);
00033        }
00034 
00035        static void Delete(const ElementType& element)
00036        {
00037               delete element;
00038        }
00039 };
00040

00046 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter = TDeleteAdapter<Pointer> >
00047 class TPointerVector
00048 {
00049 public:
00050        typedef typename AccessAdapter::ElementType ElementType;
00051 
00052        enum
00053        {
00057               InvalidIndex = -1
00058        };
00059 
00060        TPointerVector();
00061        TPointerVector(const TPointerVector&);
00062

00068        bool IsEmpty() const;
00069 
00073        int GetCount() const;
00074

00079 
00083        void Reset();

00090 
00094        Pointer* GetAt(int index) const;
00095 
00100        const ElementType& GetElementAt(int index) const;
00101

00106 
00112        void RemoveAt(int index);
00113

00127 
00131        void PushBack(const ElementType& element);
00132 
00136        void InsertElementAt(int index, const ElementType& element);
00137 
00138 private:
00139        typedef QVector<ElementType> Elements;

00190 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00191 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::Reset()
00192 {
00193        for (         typename Elements::iterator iter = m_elements.begin();
00194                             iter != m_elements.end();
00195                             ++iter){
00196               AccessAdapter::Delete(*iter);
00197        }
00198 
00199        m_elements.clear();
00200 }

00203 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00204 int TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::HasElement(const Pointer* elementPtr) const
00205 {
00206        int elementsCount = GetCount();
00207 
00208        for (int elementIndex = 0; elementIndex < elementsCount; elementIndex++){
00209               typename Elements::const_iterator delIter = (m_elements.begin() + elementIndex);
00210               if (AccessAdapter::GetPtr(*delIter) == elementPtr){
00211                      return elementIndex;
00212               }
00213        }
00214 
00215        return InvalidIndex;
00216 }

00219 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00220 Pointer* TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::GetAt(int index) const
00221 {
00222        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00223        Q_ASSERT(index < int(m_elements.size()));
00224 
00225        return AccessAdapter::GetPtr(m_elements[index]);
00226 }

00232        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00233        Q_ASSERT(index < int(m_elements.size()));

00239 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00240 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::SetElementAt(int index, const ElementType& element)
00241 {
00242        typename Elements::iterator delIter = (m_elements.begin() + index);
00243 
00244        AccessAdapter::Delete(*delIter);
00245 
00246        m_elements[index] = element;

00250 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00251 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::RemoveAt(int index)
00252 {
00253        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00254        Q_ASSERT(index < int(m_elements.size()));
00255 
00256        typename Elements::iterator delIter = (m_elements.begin() + index);
00257 
00258        AccessAdapter::Delete(*delIter);
00259 
00260        m_elements.erase(delIter);
00261 }

00263        
00264 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00265 bool TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::Remove(Pointer* elementPtr)
00266 {
00267        int elementsCount = GetCount();
00268 
00269        for (int elementIndex = 0; elementIndex < elementsCount; elementIndex++){
00270               typename Elements::iterator delIter = (m_elements.begin() + elementIndex);
00271               if (AccessAdapter::GetPtr(*delIter) == elementPtr){
00272                      RemoveAt(elementIndex);
00273 
00274                      return true;
00275               }
00276        }
00277 
00278        return false;
00279 }

00281 
00282 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00283 Pointer* TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::PopAt(int index)
00284 {
00285        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00286        Q_ASSERT(index < int(m_elements.size()));
00287 
00288        Pointer* popPtr = AccessAdapter::PopPtr(m_elements[index]);
00289 
00290        m_elements.erase(m_elements.begin() + index);
00291 
00292        return popPtr;
00293 }

00296 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00297 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::PushBack(const ElementType& element)
00298 {
00299        m_elements.push_back(element);
00300 }

00303 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00304 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::InsertElementAt(int index, const ElementType& element)
00305 {
00306        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00307        Q_ASSERT(index <= GetCount());
00308        Q_ASSERT(HasElement(AccessAdapter::GetPtr(element)) == InvalidIndex);
00309 
00310        m_elements.insert(m_elements.begin() + index, element);
00311 }
